description: Advanced geological research project and preparation of thesis report. The project will generally involve a field component, both supervised and unsupervised. Depending on the project, this component may incur additional costs to cover travel and accommodation during field work. Students commencing in sem 1 with #6/#6 split should enrol in ERTH6501 for sem 1 and sem 2; students commencing in sem 2 with #6/#6 split should enrol in ERTH6502 for sem 2 and the following sem 1.
